DOC.TEXT: Interactive : Columbia Pictures plans to intensify its efforts to promote its films on-line . Working with Los Angeles-based Hollywood Online Inc. , the studio will create video clips , photo and text materials based on its movies , which subscribers to on-line services can look_at and download to their personal_computers . The studio also plans to launch a " Talk to Columbia " mailbox on America Online in conjunction with the movie " Blankman , " opening Aug . 19 . AMY HARMON
